event.title: erected the towns of Sandrao, Bali and Nadol in 524 AD

data.event: The scroll mentions that on the sack of Vallabhi city in Gujarat, thirty thousand Jain families abandoned Valabhi and led by their priests found a retreat for themselves in Marwar, where they erected the towns of Sandrao, Bali and Nadol in 524 AD.
King Sarubali Baldev won the land of Bali in a battle in 1240 AD and he crowned the area his royal capital, naming it Bali after himself.
In 1608 AD King Balasingh constructed the Fort of Bali to protect the city and a wall was built around the city edges to protect it from attack.

event.title: was established in this town in March 1896

data.event: A dispensary was established in this town in March 1896.
In 1897, it served 17 in-patients and 4166 out-patients and 318 operations were performed in it.

event.title: 1900 there was a plague outbreak in town and the town was evacuated

data.event: In 1900 there was a plague outbreak in town and the town was evacuated.

event.title: occurred during the month of January 1900

data.event: 1245 deaths occurred during the month of January 1900 as a result of diarrhoea, dysentery and pneumonia.
It had a middle school in 1932 that was upgraded to high school and in 1946 had more than 200 pupils.
The telephone arrived in Bali in 1957, it got electricity in 1961 and piped water connections were given in 1970.

event.title: was established in the center of Bali in Bawari Jav in 1958

data.event: A tehsil library was established in the center of Bali in Bawari Jav in 1958.
